Overall Comment: The rep was very helpful and quick.
We have received 10 credits back on our credit card account and do not know what it is for.  All relating to date of 7/6/2022.
Made sure everything was in the box! I know things happen and that is ok. But these were books my kids in my classroom for Halloween.
I was very pleased with the help I received :) Thank you!
Very happy with this company we adore books in our family

I'm still waiting on a revised invoice that we actually never received in the first place.  Invoice 4823853 charged us tax and we are a tax exempt school district.  I submitted the tax exempt form 10/21/22 and have not heard back since.

I asked to have an organization removed from your mailing to save you money as it is going out of existance.  Instead you moved me from I think it was educator status to parent status.  The PO Box will still be closed.  I thought you would be better served to save the mailing funds for a more productive use.
The female person who took my call was amazing and so helpful.  I appreciated it some much.
If we would have had the instructions on how to access the scholastic magazine everything would have been so much easier.  However maybe it was our school who dropped the ball.
My representative wasn't able to find when I placed the order of the book I was hoping to replace. She looked for a while but provided me with a replacement regardless.

5 of the 11 books in my order were not in the box when it arrived. That's a third of my order. They were not backordered- packing slip listed them. I started three different chats and had to reexplain myself each time even though i provided my name and customer number each time. The last rep said- we don't save chats. I clicked to email them to myself, but nothing ever arrived. You are shipping the missing books, but my students will have to wait 7-10 days. No coupon for their inconvenience, no apology for the mistake. Just didn't feel like Scholastic.

uunable to get a solid answer to my question on how to pay for books or whom to right the check out too
My package said it was delivered to my school on Sunday.  But the school is closed on Sundays and no package have arrived at the school.
My package said it was delivered to my school on Sunday.  But the school is closed on Sundays and no package have arrived at the school.

It has been very hit or miss with your representatives.  Some are extremely helpful while others do not seem to care whether they resolve the problem or not. I have been with Scholastic for 23 years! I am a golden apple teacher. It is disappointing not to receive consistent good customer service as I did in the past. More accurate packing so that there is not a delay getting books into children's hands.

I am a golden apple teacher. It is disappointing not to receive consistent good customer service as I did in the past. More accurate packing so that there is not a delay getting books into children's hands.
Thank you for your prompt relies.
I communicated through chat. It was very helpful and meet all needs.
I really appreciated the quick, professional response.
Suni A. was incredibly helpful and understanding. Her customer service is excellent ( in a world where that is not always the case) and I would give her a 10 on your rating scale if I could! :)

I had 2 books missing from my order and I talked to a representative. They told me they submitted an order to get the books sent out to me but I don't see anything listed under my account or never got an email to confirm that the books are being sent to me. I would like some kind of documentation

I had 2 books missing from my order and I talked to a representative. They told me they submitted an order to get the books sent out to me but I don't see anything listed under my account or never got an email to confirm that the books are being sent to me. I would like some kind of documentation

I heard the ding saying the person responded, and came back to the computer as soon as I could, and she was already gone. I understand they are busy, but literally 90 seconds is insufficient time to respond. I opened and was reading the messages and it shut down. I needed to ask for the tracking number, but didn't get to.

I think there should be a more streamlined approach to report a missing package. I had to search to find the number to call. when I clicked the call option on the website, it wanted to send it to my phone, which didn't work.   The lady on the phone was super nice and helpful, which I appreciated.

The reason I am dissatisfied is because I tried to support Scholastic books by sending home flyers and taking my class to the book fair. When a five year old accidentally bought the same book that her mom just ordered with the flyer the week before, I was surprised that I have to pay to send the book back in order to get this mother her six dollar credit.
Customer Service Rep was very helpful and efficient in solving my problem. Thank you!!
I was missing an item from my order. The Scholastic team was great about responding quickly and getting the missing item sent.

The customer service representative was very helpful.  She collected my order number and what was wrong.  I had an extra book sent to me in my order and he/she allowed me to keep it for my classroom library!
I spoke to someone from the Live Chat and they helped resolve my issue.

It is frustrating as a school that you need to ask for tax exempt status every time that you place a teacher order.  Also this time I was informed that nothing can be done until I receive all of the books that I ordered.  This is frustrating for a school districts business department that try to stay on top of all transactions that occur on a monthly basis and now items get charged but tax doesn't get reimbursed until the following month.

The chat was helpful though the information was not communicated clearly originally. I wish the website had listed that the teacher bonus items would ship separately 2-4 weeks later, as the chat helper communicated. It would have been great to know this ahead of time! :)
All inquiries were responded to quickly and questions were answered quickly.
I paid for books ONE YEAR AGO AND STILL HAVEN'T RECEIVED THEM
It was very easy to talk to someone and resolve a problem.
Prompt response to issue with my order.
Try and move the process of getting a book that was left out of your order along.
I was not contacted.  I had an order notice in an email, that asked me to simply click submit in my cart.  There was nothing in my cart to submit.
I was not contacted.  I had an order notice in an email, that asked me to simply click submit in my cart.  There was nothing in my cart to submit.

The representative was fine. She was great. The problem is that it takes forever to get the flyers to hand out to my students. Also, I have SDC Students. That means I have students who are in 8th grade, who have IEPs, and who cannot read at grade level. Some of them can only read at the 1st grade or 2nd grade level. I know that you cannot do anything about this, but when you advertise 1st and 2nd grade on the cover of the flyers, it is demoralizing to students who are struggling emergent readers even though that is right around their reading level. Provide more high interest books for middle schoolers
I think the website for ordering books is getting too busy and confusing. I love the online ordering option but wish using the bonus points was less confusing.
I was not informed of missing item...that would be helpful
Sending the correct items in my order the first time.

Not having to contact you in the first place - why I have 2 different customer numbers and neither of them have the correct digits to fill in the customer number on the slip to send in actual checks is frustrating.
I appreciate how quickly my problem was solved.
Jennifer was extremely helpful and made my experience very pleasurable. Perfect example of what customer service representatives should all be like.
Offer more $1 choices for teachers and parents, send catalogues/fliers along with orders in the book box.
Offer more $1 choices for teachers and parents, send catalogues/fliers along with orders in the book box.
Customer service rep got back to me very quick and solved the issue.
Please bring back ship to home with the $25 order. I have shared the link with friends and family. If they order, that option isn't available for them and they won't be able to support our classroom.

There was a problem with a book order for my student which was taking longer than usual. A rep stated that is was lost or "stuck" and reissued a replacement order. Within that week, I received both orders. I contacted another rep about the duplicate books. I was informed that a return label would be sent and that I can drop it at a local UPS store. This now became my problem. I suggested if I could possibly keep the extra books for my classroom library. I was informed that I would be charged for the books if I kept them. Anyway, I am waiting for a label since I am not willing to pay for someone's shipping issue. I am not certain if my suggestion was even an option because the response was quick and I doubt that they even bothered  to ask a supervisor.

I need someone to call me regarding a refund or credit.

An order was placed in error by Scholastic. I tried to cancel the order as soon as possible. I was told that the order was in process & could not be cancelled. This was less than 24 hours from the order being made. I was trying to save your company the time, effort, & expense of sending the book order. I was told to refuse the order & return to sender when it arrived. It would have been so much simpler for all if it could have been cancelled.

My question was answered so promptly. I really appreciated having a quick understanding of why I wasn't offered the $10 in free books on this order. It was because I had made a previous order in this month. I was really glad to know so quickly. It gave me more confidence in this year's version of Scholastic. Last year, I just stopped ordering because of the nightmare of the wait, missing books, and length of time it took to fulfill student orders. I was hesitant this year, but so far, it is like night and day. Books are arriving quickly and the communication is faster than I even imagined it would be. Thank you, Ms. Woodhouse
The customer service representative was so kind and helped me tremendously!
The extra book is given out as a prize.  My students love wondering who will get the free book.  Thank you So much.  MDietz

We have a favorite series of books called Press Start.  We own several.  They are all falling apart in the same way.  The response from scholastic was to return them to our book fair.  I feel if it was just one book this might be ok but this seems to be a larger issue.  My kids love these books!

Do not offer horror books for children. You are offering horror books for children. This is not okay. Goosebumps and Five Nights at Freddy's????!!!??? Are you serious? Even the book cover gives me the creeps.
I was hoping you carried the complete set!!
I appreciate your prompt response. Thank you.
I put the wrong amount of books on the order and she said she was going to adjust it, but I didn't recieve an email confirming the adjustment
Fast turnaround, and easy tax exempt

We did get our books very quickly this time.  Last year, we had really delayed orders at this time of year which made us not order very much after that.  I realize since Covid that has been a problem with many business.  I would say that if that were the case in the future, the customer service people should make the customers more aware of the delay because the book orders are so seasonal. The customer service reps are unpredictable.  Some of them seem very capable and some are very confused.  We typically call in our book orders.

Since Scholastic as a company is responsible for not putting a paid item in the box before shipping, there should have been something other than "I'm sorry." Rush it out rather than make us wait 7-10 ADDITIONAL days for company error. Or, allow the book to be sent to the home of the person who paid for it. Where is the accountability? Where is the responsibility that this company is going to take? I was in the middle of typing and the chat disconnected me (timed out) before I could complete the sentence!

I am a little frustrated about being able to order the $1 books. I get sponsors for my students and they look forward to the books.
Scholastic responded quickly to help remedy an order with missing books and was very easy to work with.  Everyone who responded was very professional and polite.  This was a great experience.

I was told I would be connected to another department and never got to that department. I have a $200 credit, that I would like to spend and I would also like to get signed up for book orders from my students.
I tried to chat and no one ever joined the chat. But I received a  message saying someone had left the chat.
I appreciated the timely response and follow up.

My credit balance still is not what it should be.  I had 120.95 credit in August.  It went down to 80.00 and some odd cents.  Then, when I contacted someone a few days ago, it went up to 105.00.  It should be back up to 115.00.  I spent $5.00, so it wouldn't be at the 120.95 amount.  She said it might take a few weeks which I don't understand.

I was asking how to order the text talk read aloud curriculum and i was directed to an email address that said it received my request (and that the email address would no longer be valid in november) and i have heard nothing else.
Marina was very helpful and kind. She solved my problem quickly.
I greatly appreciated the fast response with my concern. Thank you for your help!
I still have not received all of the books from my order and it wasn’t clear whether another book was being sent for the book I hadn’t received.

For educators and schools that are tax exempt, it would make it easier if we could have the taxes removed at time of paying, rather than wait for it to ship and have to contact company and ask for taxes to be removed, then we can pay.

I LOVE Scholastic books!  I love the prices and the speed at which we receive our books. Thank you for providing such a valuable resource that helps me get LOTS of books into homes that have NO books.

Scholastic is continuing to use the address of my old school. My credit card has been charged for my subscription to Scholastic News and Science Spin. My students are not able to access the digital magazine because of the address confusion. Apparently the office manager from my former school tried to call and update the information, but she reports the subscription was canceled. I don't understand this since my credit card has already been billed.
I needed extra bonus points that i received after my order and your service was quick and easy.  Thank you!

The chat person followed Scholastic's return policy, however, I have been a Scholastic Book Clubs customer for over 30 years and I would think the customer service would be more accommodating in the situation. Contact me if you would like to know what happened. I would be happy to discuss it and hopefully get some help on your end. Thank you.
I have not received an email or call in response to my email to scholastic. Missing book from order that I paid for.
I have not received an email or call in response to my email to scholastic. Missing book from order that I paid for.
I really appreciate the help in getting my students their missing books in a timely fashion.
The representative was very helpful and resolved my question.
My concern and need of information was answered in a quick and professional manner.

I was disappointed that an item was missing from my order, but I appreciate how easy it was to contact Scholastic with my issue.  The customer service rep on the chat was very quick and helpful  Thank you!

This has happened several times to me and I am fed up. Somehow my name keeps getting changed on my account to Elizabeth Myers. No one has ever worked here with that name. Boxes come in that name here, even sometimes flyers. I continue to change in on my account via teacher's desk and it keeps getting changed back. I am Lisa Richards and I am the owner of Little Owls Learning Center. This needs fixed, for good.
